sources.title: The Tavern on Pyatnitskaya
sources.description:
The film is set in the 1920s Moscow, the era of the NEP. A violent gang is on the loose, instilling terror into the Zamoskvorechye. Daring raids follow one after another. They clearly show the M.O. of a known recidivist nicknamed “Sery,” who was recently released from prison. Bandits’ favorite resting place is an inn on Pyatnitskaya Street. There’s no way to catch them red-handed. The only way to expose the perpetrators is to infiltrate this “tavern”... 

Year of production: 1978

Directed by: Alexander Feintsimmer
Written by: Nikolai Leonov
Directors of photography: Sergey Vronsky, Vsevolod Simakov
Music: Andrei Eshpai
Production designer: Vadim Kislykh
Starring: Alexander Galibin, Marina Dyuzheva, Gennady Korolkov, Lev Prygunov, Tamara Semina, Konstantin Grigoryev, Nikolay Eremenko Jr., Viktor Perevalov, Yuri Nazarov, Gleb Strizhenov, Larisa Yeremina

The film was digitally restored by Mosfilm Cinema Concern
Find out more: https://cg.mosfilm.ru/en
Subscribe to our YouTube channel, and be sure to click the bell so that you won’t miss the best Soviet movies! 

#crime #detective #bandits #FullMoviesWithEngSubs
